General.Name: Alexanderwerk Aktiengesellschaft
General.Description: Alexanderwerk Aktiengesellschaft engages in the development, production, and sale of dry compaction and granulation machines for the chemical, food, life science, nuclear, and pharmaceutical industries worldwide. Its products include roller compactors, moist granulators, and rotor fine granulators, and grater/shredders. The company also provides machine rental, plant construction, and contract manufacturing services. Alexanderwerk Aktiengesellschaft was founded in 1885 and is headquartered in Remscheid, Germany.
